verses.roman:
taṁ pāpaṁ jahi dāśārha
tan naḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṁ param
pūya-śoṇita-vin-mūtra-
surā-māṁsābhivarṣiṇam

synonyms: tam—that; pāpam—sinful person; jahi—please kill; dāśārha—O descendant of Daśārha; tat—that; naḥ—to us; śuśrūṣaṇam—service; param—best; pūya—pus; śoṇita—blood; vit—feces; mūtra—urine; surā—wine; māṁsa—and meat; abhivarṣiṇam—who pours down.
translation: O descendant of Daśārha, please kill that sinful demon, who pours down pus, blood, feces, urine, wine and meat upon us. This is the best service You can do for us.
